fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Transport, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
We are almost “new” in this specific field. We want to deepen and enhance the quality of our job at this level. 
 
We are targeting the area of the European Projects for SME, bringing our competency and expertise to a European level.  
 
We started by cooperating with some companies in a few European Projects as described in the following section, and we would like to actively participate to the present Public Stakeholders Consultation on Horizon 2020 to bring our ideas and insights.
relevant_communication:
We participated/presented the application to these European Programs: 
 
Italy-Switzerland Interreg Program - First Call – Project Title: “Intreccio”, 29/09/2016 
 
Italy-Switzerland Interreg Program - First Call – Project Title: “Anodico”, 30/09/2016 
 
Horizon 2020 - Clean Sky – Project Title: “High Voltage Connector for PWM Application”, 18/04/2013 
 
Horizon 2020 - SmeInstrument Phase 1 – Project Title: “Met Aids”, 03/05/2016 
 
Horizon 2020 - SmeInstrument Phase 1 – Project Title: “Digimap”, 07/09/2016 
 
Horizon 2020 - SmeInstrument Phase 2 – Project Title: “Box4Security”, 12/10/2016 
 
Horizon 2020 - SmeInstrument Phase 1 – Project Title: “Velocity”, 09/11/2016 
 
Horizon 2020 - SmeInstrument Phase 1  – Project Title: “Follow Me”, 09/11/2016 
 
Horizon 2020 - SmeInstrument Phase 1  – Project Title: “I Am Here”, 09/11/2016 
 
Actually we are replanning our entire communication activities pushing towards a more solid and stronger relationship and cooperation with EU Institutions, Partners, European Actors.
customers: Glenair Italia SPA# S.C.A.I. Solution SRL# Radarmeteo SRL# Digital Dictionary Servizi SRL# IGB SRL
goals__remit:
We help companies in finding financial resources and tax breaks to achieve their own projects. 
 
We simplify the path to obtain financial funds thanks to our expertise about procedures and laws. 
 
We address companies towards strategic and organisational decisions for the growth. 
 
We define a focused and personalised consultancy by providing specific solutions.
